name: INSIDE YOU
description:
Take control of WHITE CELL, a... white blood cell tasked with saving his host organism from the attack of vicious viruses!

This game was created as an entry for the QUARANTINE JAM and  for the AKOM QUARANTINE GAME JAM PLUS!

Credits:

Art: myself

Game Design: myself

Level Design: myself

Coding: myself

Music and SFXs: all audio files in the project is royalty free and can be found on the internet.
